JobTitle: Digital Experiences, Global Analytics & Insights Manager, Community Operations
JobFullDesc: **Other Acceptable Levels: 5**About the RoleThe Digital Experiences Manager on the Community Operations (CommOps) Global Analytics & Insights (A&I) team will work closely with product, data infrastructure and business teams to design, build and maintain key metrics which drive the business and lead deep analytical analyses to derive insights. You will work with key stakeholders to manage project intake, prioritization, and staffing, and coach and develop junior team members to deliver high-quality work. The ideal candidate is an expert at working with large data sets, has experience with data visualization, and is passionate about data and analytics. They will also have strong stakeholder management skills and the ability to build consensus by clearly communicating and presenting information.  What You’ll Do: Develop an in-depth understanding of CommOps’ business performance and share strategic insights with senior leadership to influence decision makingTranslate ambiguous questions from CommOps’ executives into data-driven recommendationsProvide analytical thought leadership for big picture strategy projects; lead junior analysts to drive implementationPlay a leadership role in developing and standardizing analytical tools; building executive level dashboards, frameworks and processes; to uplevel and democratize analytically grounded decision making at all levels of the businessDevelop executive-level communications and presentations for Uber's senior leadership team Basic Qualifications Minimum 4 years of experience in data analytics, business analytics, or a similar roleSQL and other data analytics experienceBA/BS in Economics, Business, Engineering, Operations Research, STEM, or other quantitative focus (or equivalent work experience) Preferred Qualifications MBA, Master's degree in quantitative fields4 years or more of experience in data analytics or a similar roleExperience translating stakeholders' business goals to technical projects, including working with large datasets (SQL), building data visualizations, and mining product and operational insightsExperience in leading junior analysts / leading a teamExperience working with customer support or customer insightsComfort in working with ambiguity in a fast-paced environmentAbout the Team Community Operations (CommOps) is the voice and face of Uber, and its largest org (10k+ employees). We work across the platform (Rides, Eats and more) and are responsible for customer support, social media, sales / conversion, and safety response. We are also the Voice of the Customer to the Tech/Ops teams. The Global A&I team is the central Analytics and Insights (A&I) team for CommOps. We have three broad purposes - (1) Own CommOps’ data integrity and quality, and metrics definitions and reporting, (2) Inform CommOps leadership’s priorities by generating high-value analytical insights, (3) Support CommOps global teams' A&I needs. Our projects are typically broad in scope, which means there is tremendous opportunity to make a huge impact on the business.
